entry.title: Vite report on Tue, 15 Aug 2023 20:01:31
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Tesla reintroduces more affordable ‘Standard Range’ versions of Model S and X

Business:
- Children Picture Book Market Is Dazzling Worldwide | Emerging ...
- The next big Hollywood star! Emma Mackey says Barbie has changed her life
- Don't worry about stocks with the Fed closing in on its dream no-recession scenario, Goldman Sachs says
- Companies are increasingly making counteroffers to staff who have been offered new jobs — often because they can't be bothered to find replacements — UK survey finds
- The idea of a BRICS common currency is almost 'embarrassing', says the economist who named the group
- Ukraine's counteroffensive would fall apart without all the Russian vehicles it has captured, frontline mechanic says
- Someone hacked a news ticker in Russia to insult Putin after the value of the ruble plunged
- Silly season is over for markets - and GameStop will crash next, 'Bond King' Bill Gross says
- Billionaire investor Bill Ackman's hedge fund boosts Alphabet stake as AI hype rages on
- Introducing the Safer: A Better Alternative to Safes for Startup Financing

- SAG-AFTRA is further restricting what projects can move forward during the strike

AI:
- Billionaire investor Bill Ackman's hedge fund boosts Alphabet stake as AI hype rages on

Other:
- A mystery 300-mile wide formation lurking beneath Australia may be the largest asteroid impact crater on Earth
- Elon Musk, who's fathered 10 children, reportedly donated $10 million to fund a fertility and population research project

- VC Jennifer Stojkovic's post went viral after a founder harassed her in a LinkedIn pitch: 'It's much more common than you think'

Insights:
- The tech industry is seeing advancements in electric vehicles, AI startups, and innovative solutions for agriculture and healthcare.
- The business sector is experiencing changes in the stock market, job market, and international economic relations.
- AI continues to be a prominent topic, with investments and developments in AI technologies.
- Other topics include scientific discoveries, philanthropy, legal cases, and societal issues related to technology and climate change.
- Overall, the report highlights the diverse and dynamic nature of the global landscape in various industries.
